agents.name: App Ideation

jobs.name: bread-factory-check
jobs.description: Checks Bread Factory for Not Started tasks
jobs.fullDescription: Query Notion database 305a2bc5-bfbd-8018-8081-c81b37840743 (Bread Factory) for 'Not Started' tasks. If any exist, work on them. When complete, update Notion and post to channel 1473217542305611831 ONLY. Do NOT query Idea Lab.

jobs.name: muffin-morning-update
jobs.description: Morning trading journal update to Discord
jobs.fullDescription: Query Notion. Use message tool to send to channel 1473217542305611831 ONLY. Do not post to general.

jobs.name: muffin-meeting
jobs.fullDescription: Review trading journal from last 24 hours. Analyze P&L, wins/losses, patterns. Discuss with Muffin: what's working, what's not. Make system adjustments if needed. Prepare summary for 8am report.

jobs.name: muffin-daily-report
jobs.description: Daily Muffin scan report to Discord
jobs.fullDescription: Run 'cd /home/deanfieldz/.openclaw/workspace && node muffin-run.js'. Post full results to #morning-update 1473217542305611831.

jobs.name: muffin-auto-scan
jobs.fullDescription: Run 'cd /home/deanfieldz/.openclaw/workspace && node muffin-run.js'. Check positions and auto-close any that hit targets. ONLY post to #morning-update if there are open positions OR if a setup is found. If no positions and no setups, do not post.

jobs.name: app-ideation-daily
jobs.description: App ideation v1 + v2 report to Notion
jobs.fullDescription: Run App Ideation report v1 AND v2: 1) Use app-ideation skill (v1 - trends focus) 2) Use app-ideation-v2 skill (v2 - revenue focus) 3) Create new page in Notion Idea Lab database (309a2bc5-bfbd-802c-9ba9-f708d00b4c23) with title 'App Ideation Report - Feb 2026' format and add tag 'App Idea Report' to Tags column 4) Post v1 and v2 results to Discord #morning-update
